comments.body: Also removed in https://github.com/facebook/jest/commit/b430e51a34b389c0f43dfdcf05fab5220a7b5677#diff-98e61ded296e35d3a4fcae207101edeb (PR https://github.com/facebook/jest/pull/4578). I'm not 100% sure if this is the right way to handle this.

You can leave it in and always open a PR with an update once a new version without it is published - then there should be a published `@types` version both with and without it, so people on either version can get what they need.
